member.name: T:Sdl.Tridion.Api.Client.ItemType
member.summary: Specifies the Content Manager item types.
member.remarks: This enumeration defines both the symbolic names and numeric values for all TCM item types. The numeric values are used in TCM URIs. Note that the numeric values look like bit flags, but they are not really: repository-local, system-wide and workflow item types have overlapping bit values. Therefore, performing bitwise ORs or ANDs is dangerous; it can only be done for item types of the same "class" (repository-local, system-wide or workflow).

member.name: M:Sdl.Tridion.Api.IqQuery.IQuery.MultiMatch(System.String)
member.summary:
Searches given text in both content and dynamically indexed fields with the following syntax: "content.*","dynamic.*"
The query operator is OR. Important note: the operator in multi match queries works on the given terms and not on the fields.

member.name: M:Sdl.Tridion.Api.IqQuery.IQuery.GroupedAnd(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.IList)
M:Sdl.Tridion.Api.IqQuery.IQuery.GroupedOr(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.IList)
member.summary:
Grouped OR query on multiple fields and values.
Example: GroupedAnd({"id","type"},{"1","page"} becomes: +(id:1 type:page)
List lengths must match or query param may be smaller.

member.name: M:Sdl.Tridion.Api.IqQuery.IQuery.GroupedNot(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Collections.IList)
member.summary:
Grouped NOT query on multiple fields and values.
Example: GroupedAnd({"id","type"},{"1","page"} becomes: (-id:1 -type:page)
List lengths must match or query param may be smaller.
